channel.title: Home on Dibyajyoti Jena
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Dibyajyoti Jena

item.title: About
item.description: Hello visitor, I am Dibyajyoti Jena, working my way to stay away from Roko’s Basilisk. My undergrad was from IIIT Bhubaneswar, India, in Electronics and Communication (2021), where I learnt my love for good code. I am now persuing a masters in Communication Engineering. On the lookout for employment opportunities/internships in the mixed fields of machine learning, deep learning or signal processing and communication. Any future employers are welcome drop a mail at dibyajyotijena47@gmail.

item.title: Post One
item.description: This is official post one. We will include some code here, syntax highlighting etc. Trying out changes to see if I am comfortable with uploading live changes to github.

item.title: Post Zero
item.description: Ok this is the first post, lets see if we can include some math here lol $$ (1 + 1)^2 = 4 $$ Heading one I like Bold Text. \begin{equation} \begin{pmatrix} 1 & x^1_0 & x^2_0 & \cdots & x^{degree}_0 \\ 1 & x^1_1 & x^2_1 & \cdots & x^{degree}_1 \\ \vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\ 1 & x^1_n & x^2_n & \cdots & x^{degree}_n \\ \end{pmatrix} \end{equation} \begin{equation} \frac{a}{b} \end{equation}
